keyMoments.title: Capture Shirahoshi and Jinbe
keyMoments.description: Successfully capture Shirahoshi, Jinbe, and Megalo using a trap with a balloon duplicate of Neptune.
keyMoments.significance: Completes their capture of all the royal family members, giving Hody complete control over Fish-Man Island.

keyMoments.title: Control of Gyoncorde Plaza
keyMoments.description: Hold all members of the Neptune royal family prisoner at Gyoncorde Plaza, chanting for their deaths.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates their complete takeover of Fish-Man Island and public display of power.

description: A fish-man pirate crew led by Hody Jones that seeks to overthrow the Neptune royal family and take control of Fish-Man Island through violence and hatred toward humans.
